website_summaries.verdict: If you don't need a lot of bags or like the multiple colors, you may prefer these bags over the others.
pros: Comes in a variety of fun colors per pack that help to brighten up the mood of clean-up duty
cons: Since you only get 120 in the package, others on our shortlist offer better value
They feel slightly thin, but still hold up to most messes

website_summaries.verdict: Choose these bags if you don't need a large quantity and like the fun colors. Bags are also easy to use.
pros: Dog owners brag about the bright colors that add a bit of lightheartedness to an unpleasant task
Bags feel fairly sturdy and are leak-proof
cons: Fits most standard dog waste bag dispensers, but doesn't come with one
Some bags come off the rolls with holes in the bottoms

customer_reviews.title: Do their job
customer_reviews.text: Our autistic son can open these 9 times out of 10 without difficulty. He enjoys taking our 4 dogs out and these come in handy! He enjoys separating them and putting them all in a big ziploc bag. They hold up with but don't really smell a "scent"- I am not sure they are supposed to have one either but they do their job. With the amount of poop bags in our outdoor trashcan at the end of the week gets pretty stinky but a plus is that they are closed well and we don't end up with maggots/flies. We purchased these on our subscribe and save they work so well.
customer_reviews.author: Carter Family

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love little bags for poop
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? Bags for poop, they serve their purpose. After perusing amazon I decided of all the options available for these, these held the best value for the price and quantity offered. We went camping for 8 days with our Doberman and Belgian Malinois. That's a lot of baggies to fill. Fill them we did, because you always keep your campsite cleaner than you found it! We have lots of little bags leftover and they will be put in 1) the car for messes, 2) the tackle box for messes, 3) the diaper bag so they can still fulfill their purpose to hold poop, and/or poop related messes.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Ok but thicker bags can be found for less money.
customer_reviews.text: We really liked these bags. They were quick to come off the roll and opened fairly easy. Important when you have three dogs waiting on you to pick up their business. They were a nice thickness not like cheaper bags. We did happen to get very low on supply and were at Target which sold them also. To save time we purchased them there. For some reason the bags in the 2nd purchase were not as thick as first ones. So next refill was Target brand bags. They ended being the ones that were favored and that we purchase regularly.
customer_reviews.author: abbey mccarthyTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Nice poop bags!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to re fill my dogs poop bag holder I like that they are scented! Helps when even when you tie the bag of poop still smells horrible so helps to be scented! You get a lot of bags for your money think it’s a good deal. Bags are durable none have ripped yet! And pretty colors!
customer_reviews.author: Missy!

customer_reviews.title: A great value
customer_reviews.text: You get a lot of bags for approximately the same amount you would spend to get far less than you would get buying bags in a store. It is great to have them available as a subscribe and save item so you can have them sent at a frequency that works for you. If you have just one dog, chances are you will only need a re-supply every 2-3 months. They are very sturdy and large enough to easily tie off. I definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.Top Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them! UPDATE: These bags are probably the hardest to open doggie bags I've ever had. It's especially frustrating when it's freezing cold out and I have to take my gloves off and fumble with the bag while my dog is tugging on the leash. It takes me on average 2-3 minutes to open a bag. I've tried everything. I think it's because they're so thin. You can't rub them apart, tear them open, or anything you usually try to open the bags. I will not be buying these bags again.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: New odor-eliminating smell is a turn-off
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these for over 5 years for cleaning out my cat litter boxes. They’re incredibly sturdy, but now that they’re scented I have to find another vendor. The scent is incredibly strong & strong perfume-type smells are likely to trigger migraines plus the smell is apparently infused in the bag itself & doesn’t noticeablly dissipate (I’ve even tried unrolling the rolls in an attempt to lessen the smell).
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Unscented has changed and has a “slight” scent that is noticeable to those with allergies
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for 9 years. UNSCENTED. The latest “unscented” are definitely scented or like many unscented products are scented and then have a masking fragrance. DOES ANYONE UNDERSTAND WHAT IT IS LIKE TO HAVE ALLERGIES TO SCENTS/PERFUMES?????? And the bags are getting thinner and thinner.
customer_reviews.author: Reading, Learning, Growing.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE These Pooper Bags.
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleasantly surprised to find that these bags are scented. And the scent lasts quite a long time. I love the bright colors (my doggy girls don't give a hoot). As any dog owner knows that sometimes what our babies leave behind isn't always pleasant to pick up but because these bags are so well made you can rest assured you will be able to stay clean during the pick-up chore.
customer_reviews.author: lesliehefner

customer_reviews.title: Best Pickup Bag Around
customer_reviews.text: Best pick up bag for me. Just the right thickness - not so thin that you feel the poop or so thick that it is not flexible. Also like the colors. Used to buy it from Target but they stopped selling this brand. Now go straight to Amazon. So many products that the "brick and mortars" stopped selling that I now buy regularly on Amazon. And you wonder why the stores are going under.
customer_reviews.author: Stevo

customer_reviews.title: Strong bags
customer_reviews.text: The plastic of these is slightly thicker than ones I've bought in my local grocery store. They hold well and don't pop when you fill them with kitty litter and poo. The ones from the grocery store were fine, but the ones from the dollar store didn't even hold air most of the time, they were so poorly made. These are great and I'll keep buying them. It's easier to order here than remembering them when I'm buying food.
customer_reviews.author: Rock Finder

customer_reviews.title: Used to be great, but now they have a super strong unpleasant scent
customer_reviews.text: These have been my go-to bags forever, and I was surprised to find that the last package I ordered had a super strong perfume-like scent. It's bad enough that I'll have to look for new unscented bags. The smell is just really strong and unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: New is now always improved
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these bags for years they WERE perfect! New is not always improved or better - while I do like the new scent, they are now flimsy and more rip apart now bring pulled off the roll than I get to use .... I use them for my cats litter box, and for the *flushable* bathroom wipes you are not supposed to flush
customer_reviews.author: PixieL

customer_reviews.title: They'll Work In A Pinch.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are all right, but they're not nearly big enough to hold all that they have to hold, so I will continue my search for a more ample bag, and one that also keeps the odors inside where they belong, because I can't always get out the garbage can immediately. These aren't as big or as good as the other bags I had, and why all the different colors, these are for excrement, not a fashion statement.
customer_reviews.author: catchatter 7

customer_reviews.title: The black line!
customer_reviews.text: The black line at the top of the bag made all the difference to me when walking two dogs and picking up their mess. I could easily reach the bag with one hand, open it, and know immediately which was the open end, by checking that black line! Recently I just loss my last dog, but my memories of the convenience of the colorful Out bags will be forever!!
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: They're OK
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a fill in for the ones I normally buy because it was in between payday's and money was tight !.lol.....These are just OK in my opinion...I mean they do what they're supposed to do, but quite a bit thinner than my normal ones....Although it doesn't matter to me, I don't get even a hint of a "fresh scent".....Not a very good value cost-wise for what you get either...
customer_reviews.author: M. Damron

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: These are unscented. They are thicker than cheaper plastic bags, so you get what you pay for. Good quality and quantity. And they are easy to tear off the roll and to open up. Some cheaper plastic waste bags are difficult to handle -- you don't know which end to open, and the sides cling together so it takes forever to open.
customer_reviews.author: P. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Only one negative thing...
customer_reviews.text: Overall these are great - you get so many for the price and they fit great in the little roller/holder we already had for dog poop bags. The only negative about these is the color isn't opaque so you can see the poop through it, which is just a little gross to me when you're walking around with a bag with visible poop in it haha. Otherwise, they're great!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Larger bag = less chance of poop on the hand LOL
customer_reviews.text: We really love these bags. This large package was a good bargain. The smell is pleasant and the large size makes it easier to pick up the poo without getting it on you. We can also tie it off, which makes it much more pleasant to carry until we get the to nearest trash can.
customer_reviews.author: #1 DogMom

customer_reviews.title: Very strong sickening smell to me, actually making me sick.
customer_reviews.text: I order these all the time but didn’t pay attention that these are scented . I didn’t open them until now and the smell is making me sick it’s so strong. I just past the return time so they can’t be returned. I put them in the yard the odor is so strong. Will have to pay more attention if I order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Z's mom

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item received
customer_reviews.text: I have a subscription to the unscented bags. I received the scented bags this past month and they're awful, definitely an allergy trigger if you or someone in your family is sensitive to smells.
customer_reviews.author: needsomeshoes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite bags by far! The scent they have is very nice. But what I appreciate is that I’ve never had a bag that opened on both ends, which has happened to me with other brands. I would definitely recommend these bags to others. Great product for my 2 pooches! Personally, I like the bright colors too!
customer_reviews.author: Drea from So Cal

customer_reviews.title: BEST Bags EVER for Great Danes!
customer_reviews.text: SO many bags are just TOO small when it comes to cleaning up after a Great Dane. These bags are perfect and sturdy!! Love buying them in bulk so I'm not running to the store every week to restock! Will be back again and again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie A

customer_reviews.title: Latest bags have a bad scent.
customer_reviews.text: I have liked these bags in the past, but the latest packet had an awful smell to them. Since I am a dog sitter/walker who is sensitive to scents, this was a big disappointment. Now I have to scramble to find some new bags. I'm not sure if it was a bad batch or what, but it is no favor to add scents to plastic poop bags. Now I need to find another brand.
customer_reviews.author: SJ Weigel

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: these work ok but I am very frustrated with this brand . It is very difficult to get them opened. I actually have to spit on them to get them opened . they tear off ok and fit my container . won't buy again because of the trouble getting individual bag opened .
customer_reviews.author: Kay b

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bags!
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best dog waste bags that I’ve found. While most bags are pretty thin, these are definitely thicker so you don’t have to worry about putting your finger through the bag or accidentally ripping them. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Darla

customer_reviews.title: Poop bags for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad they come in this huge box as I was constantly going to Wal-Mart to buy a 6 pack of these. They were out if them more then half the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jorin F.

customer_reviews.title: Learn how to count
customer_reviews.text: I have been using OUT! bags for years. I ordered in bulk to save a little money. But when they arrived, there were supposed to be 50 rolls with 15 bags on each--750 bags. Instead I got 49 rolls--735 bags assuming the rolls each have 15 bags on them. It is a fraction of a penny per bag I paid extra, but really amazon--how hard is it to count, especially when you provided 12 rolls of each of 4 colors, plus one in the dispenser?
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Thick bags
customer_reviews.text: Nice and thick! Not like some bags that are in this price range. I didn’t notice any kind of smell on these so not sure why that was an option to select in rating them. Are these supposed to have a scent?
customer_reviews.author: C.E.S.

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy and durable enough
customer_reviews.text: I won’t purchase these bags again. They tended to rip as I tried to pull them apart and sometimes they did not hold up well, after use, in a walk with my dog. They were also difficult to open once I pulled one off the roll.
customer_reviews.author: Mary and Rocket

customer_reviews.title: They work! Colorful :)
customer_reviews.text: Great, colorful bags for picking up your dog’s poo! Tear easily and are plenty big for any size excrement! Haha (I have big dogs). The smell is light and not annoying at all. They do what they’re supposed to and I can’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie G.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: They are a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: It is a perfect product for doing that wonderful task of picking up poop. I also like the fact it's scented with a baby powder type smell. Never have to worry about unpleasant odors.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Beware, strong scent!
customer_reviews.text: Scent is STRONG and smells like old perfume to me. Yucky.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bates

customer_reviews.title: Much better than some
customer_reviews.text: I am buying these again, since the last order of another brand sucked. These are much easier to pull apart, have writing so I can tell top from bottom, and have a pleasant scent.
customer_reviews.author: dg

customer_reviews.title: Craptastic! No, really. Buy these.
customer_reviews.text: Will buy again. I've bought bags before where they were not seemed well. You know, hole at both ends? These are well made and with a fun color, picking up Fido's steaming gift doesn't seem like such a chore anymore. Too bad the colors are not scent coordinated; purple would be grape... just kidding.
customer_reviews.author: JFoster

customer_reviews.title: Strong bags
customer_reviews.text: I use one bag for both of my dogs when I take them out. These bags are strong and easy to maneuver around the mess inside so that you can clean up a couple of piles. However, my dogs are both Chihuahuas so I don’t know how these will hold up with big dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Great for kittens!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to pick up and dispose of kitten poop after switching to the breeze litterbox system. I've used 6 rolls and only two bags have spilt (the first bag of the roll) but if you are careful enough you can avoid it. These bags have an overbearing smell of grandma's house but isn't an issue for me because my scoop and dispose game is strong. With a 7 month old kitten these bags have lasted me two months. I would recommend and purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Damien

customer_reviews.title: WOULD NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to help clean up our yard because between us and our neighbors we have usually about 4 dogs here. I pull out the first roll and the first couple are okay, but then most of the rest of them had TEARS IN THEM. I didn't notice the first time and I thought maybe I had ripped it, but sure enough, the next one I picked out also had a cut in it. It is a straight line, as if by a box cutter of some sort. They are kind of cheap, so I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy F.

customer_reviews.title: Essential for walks
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these bags for years now, and wouldn't go on walks without them. They conveniently fit in my dispenser on the leash, are good quality, and fairly priced.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Elbers

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: What a buy! These are our favorite poo bags, and when I found them packaged in bulk like this, it was a no-brainer. Saves time and aggravation looking for them in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi G

customer_reviews.title: Poopie bags work
customer_reviews.text: Great quality scented bags. Sometimes the scent and poop don't mix well but I just hold my breath. They're mean to hold poop and it does it very well.
customer_reviews.author: Maricela O

customer_reviews.title: Just as described, fasti shipping
customer_reviews.text: No “mishaps “ with any bags ... The bags are a little hard to get apart, but are nice size so even if you have a big dog they’re of adequate size.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for a good price point
customer_reviews.text: Nice product for a good price point. Shipped and arrived fast. No issues with bags tearing, plenty of room to scoop my 18 lb dog's poop. I don't use a dispenser, but they look like they would fit right into one. They are just a bit sturdier than a plastic grocery bag, not saying much, but they have held up for me, so I have no complaints. I've used an entire pack of 120 now. Not one problem with any of the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Laura C

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I like this Product for a few reasons since trying cheaper brands. It's thick enough so it doesn't feel like you are actually touching poo. Also the scent does help Offset other smells.
customer_reviews.author: Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: Great poopie bags
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my doxie and they are the perfect size. I love the colors and they have a great smell. Thus far, I have found them to be very durable. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie L. Mcknight

customer_reviews.title: Are you going to make this purchase right?
customer_reviews.text: This is the second package I have ordered of these, obviously I like them the first time around. Just got to the new rolls and I thought it was just a fluke that about every second to third bag came out torn down the side...But the same thing is happening with the second roll! I would return but missed the date.
customer_reviews.author: Ir

customer_reviews.title: Best Poop Bag Period!!
customer_reviews.text: Stop looking - this is the bag you want!! Fits in regular poop bag holders, nice thick plastic so you won't tear or put a fingernail through it trying to grab the grass on the loose ones; big enough to hold even the biggest dump; and cool colors too!!
customer_reviews.author: Tigertooth

customer_reviews.title: These bags are fine. I have a lhaso Apso mixed with yorkie ...
customer_reviews.text: These bags are fine. I have a lhaso Apso mixed with yorkie and this picks up his poop fine. I would like to purchase some for my whole neighborhood. We have plenty of dogs and no one seems to pick up behind their loved one. so annoying. Although i thought i read somewhere that these bags were scented or that they contain the smell. Have not found this too be true, but they are a great buy anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: For a German Shepard. Works very well, very sturdy and the scent does a very effective job of hiding the poop smell. We have ordered these as often as available and try to keep a supply on hand. Better than any others we have tried.
customer_reviews.author: John A.

customer_reviews.title: Lay them in the crate and let your puppy poop on them
customer_reviews.text: At first I was very happy with them. But after using them for a few days, it became clear that there is a real problem getting them open. When your puppy wants to walk and you're freezing and you have to fight with the stupid bag for more than 10 minutes to get the thing open, it just isn't worth it. You can pick up poop, just can't put it inside the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: These bags do their "dooty". Plenty of room for several poops when taking multiple dogs for a walk. Not too thin like the ones from the dollar store. Good quantity too. These will last a while!
customer_reviews.author: debra starr

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for little dogs, could be easier to open
customer_reviews.text: These do the job. A little hard to separate the sides of the bag and open so rubbing like mad sometimes to open the bag. My dogs poo is tootsie roll size, so easy to pick up and tie off the bag. These hold the odor in fairly well without leaving a tail at the garbage pail.
customer_reviews.author: Dachshund Lover

customer_reviews.title: Good, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good, especially for the price. Haven't had any issues with the bags leaking or anything. Once in awhile one of them will be hard to open which is kind of annoying but I've had that same issue with many brands.
customer_reviews.author: MDTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Smells like grandma’s perfume
customer_reviews.text: Title says it all: Smells like grandma’s perfume I left a roll of these out on my bathroom counter in my enclosed bathroom and the bathroom started to stink like grandma’s perfume
customer_reviews.author: KActon

customer_reviews.title: Very Hard to Open
customer_reviews.text: These bags are extremely hard to open. You can stand there for ten minutes rubbing your fingers over the plastic waiting for it to finally separate, but many times I have had to just rip it a little to get the two sides apart. I find them to be very frustrating. If you can get them to open, they are sturdy and deep for even the biggest pile of poo. That's the best I can say for them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: thick bags and easier to open
customer_reviews.text: I walk dogs - a lot- the bags are great because they have more substance to them and you do not worry about fingers going through when picking up their waste- also the perforations are good on the bags and do not have difficulty getting them off the roll without messing up several while trying to get just one
customer_reviews.author: Snicker

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love the sturdiness. I don’t smell anything. I don’t know if that’s a good thong or not. Still love them
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Scented poop bags are great!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Strong enough and scented. Easy to tear off and open. I use one every morning! I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shaylene Lundin

customer_reviews.title: Average bag
customer_reviews.text: Bags are typical of the dollar store bags you can buy. I have to double bag my dog’s poop to block the smell, one bag doesn’t block the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Faulty bag
customer_reviews.text: I love the bags, I really do and for our small 12 lb. pooch these are perfect, however one of the rolls I just 'opened', the bags aren't sealed so when I pull them apart, what I get is just a 12" x 9-1/4" sheet of plastic (which I discovered when I went to use one!). Thinking this may be a fluke and hoping the rest of the roll would be OK, I checked another 6+ bags and it appears the whole roll is probably defective, making a good price for the product not so great. I took a picture of a bag being pulled from the roll, still attached in the photo so you could see proof...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasent scent, good bags
customer_reviews.text: Scent is pleasant and bags work well. Easy to carry a roll on a walk. Just sometimes they don't tear properly at the seam and I've put a hole in a few tearing a bag off the roll
customer_reviews.author: RocSportsNut

customer_reviews.title: Poop bags pooped out
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these bags didn't work for me😥 They were difficult for me to open and too thin. I returned them to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Saundra Aloah-Yvonne Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Lightly scented & strong
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous! I love that they are lightly scented! They are strong, too. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Lorry

customer_reviews.title: ONLY BUY THIS BRAND
customer_reviews.text: These are the STRONGEST poop bags I have EVER come across. I will now NOT use other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie D.

customer_reviews.title: Durable bags for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Mine didn’t have a scent but these are great durable bags for a good price. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: bethie623

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is not too thin like others I bought before. Really like the quality so far.
customer_reviews.author: Magda Almeida

customer_reviews.title: excellent bags
customer_reviews.text: I have two large dogs and we go on lots of walks. These bags are the best. They never rip and are easy to get off the roll. About once a year I purchase the large box and it lasts quite a long time. I am really glad Amazon sells the economy-sized box.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Gaikowski

customer_reviews.title: I buy these regularly so we can clean up after ...
customer_reviews.text: I buy these regularly so we can clean up after our dog and be responsible pet owners. They are durable. I have bought other bags that were thin and could break through. These are not weak bags.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell. Size is okay..but my box was open when i got it. Dont know if i received all of them but its fine..its enough to last for a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: NANCY

customer_reviews.title: The scent is overwhelming.
customer_reviews.text: I loved these bags until they added the scent. The scent is overwhelming, like being closed up in a car with your 99 year old aunt who is wearing too much perfume. The bad part is that the unscented bags are no longer available.
customer_reviews.author: Kturner

customer_reviews.title: Reccomend
customer_reviews.text: What else can I say other then they are great for the job at hand ( no pun intended)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice bags for a fraction of the price you would pay in a pet store. Pretty durable. Will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: JennyLynn

customer_reviews.title: Doggie Poop Bags
customer_reviews.text: These are the best value on the market. They're sturdy, and a really good size. you can purchase them from most "big box stores" but I haven't found them for this price.
customer_reviews.author: JarheadzMom05

customer_reviews.title: Love These Bags
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags. They are big and thicker than others I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: If they could flush...
customer_reviews.text: They work. The end that has a little black square, you coax open. I just put them in my pockets. Why should a little dog carry anything?
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hartmann

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Great price and good amount for the price. Nice to have to dog bone to hold the bags. That came with another product I bought on amazon. A retractable leash
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Dog owners, this one's for you!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sized bags for a responsible dog-owner's duty. Pick-up easily after your pooch. It'll give you and other dog owners a good name. These bags are a very good buy. They're just the right size to do the job and toss in a garbage can. Easy!
customer_reviews.author: Nexta

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Poop Bags
customer_reviews.text: Great made item, very durable, quick shipment and recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: keldog1428

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, but a bit thin.
customer_reviews.text: Love how easily I can tell where to tear the bags & how easy they tear, the scent is great. Just too thin and wish it was a bit longer, I have difficulty tying them without puncturing them sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Marie T.

customer_reviews.title: These are made well!
customer_reviews.text: These are not like the dollar store cheesy bags that are thin. These are quality bags and I like them a lot! Decent price and arrived on time. Will be buying them again
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Weihs

customer_reviews.title: Typical poop baggie
customer_reviews.text: I actually use these for dirty diapers when a change is necessary in the car or at a friends house. I have used disposable and cloth diapers. The keep the smell and wetness contained.
customer_reviews.author: Tuxedo_cat

customer_reviews.title: Durable and smells food.
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about poo bags. Lightly scented and does what they’re supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: KristaLucy88

customer_reviews.title: easy, compact
customer_reviews.text: I use these for makeup trash. They fit into the little compartments in my makeup kit and I just roll one out, and toss in my trash - mascara wands, tissue paper, etc. easy, compact, and functional
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bags!
customer_reviews.text: I love these colorful dog waste pick-up bags. I have 2 dogs which one is just a visitor whom I love so, therefore when I walk them in our subdivision I've been picking up their poop! It's the right thing to do and the bags are durable and colorful. They arrived in a timely manner and I will order some more in the near future when they run out. I highly recommend buying these waste bags.
customer_reviews.author: Aveeda

customer_reviews.title: Best price around
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags. Best price around. We use them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: jamie sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use waste bags.
customer_reviews.text: I can recommend them for use with those hard plastic dispensers that attach to a leash. I find them just big enough to scope my Lab's waste and tie them off at the top. The only problem I had was with the first bag on my first roll: the seam was not properly attached and the "bag" was just a sheet of plastic. Fortunately, I haven't had that problem with any of the other rolls. Regardless of that one problem, I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: nanoShopper

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags.
customer_reviews.text: So easy to open and they smell good. Unfortunately they don't cover the smell of the poop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonshopper56

customer_reviews.title: Best poop bag on the market
customer_reviews.text: A solid performer. Bags separate easily at the perforated are but are strong when using. We have had dogs for last 25 years and these are the best poop bags We have tried many others brands but none compare
customer_reviews.author: Texas Steve

customer_reviews.title: These are great they are just the perfect thickness to be able ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great they are just the perfect thickness to be able to pick up what you're trying to pick up and not have them rip or put your finger through it. Which can be a total disaster these are great bags
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Elkins

customer_reviews.title: These are the shiznit
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these and dumps extra big whenever I bust out these rainbow beauties. Hmm ... or maybe that means he hates them? I dunno. They are a good size and I've never had an unfortunate seam rupture with these as I had with some cheaper bags.
customer_reviews.author: troy richardson

customer_reviews.title: Has  ever split open with waste inside.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and the price is good for the amount .opens easily.And good size for picking up dog waste.different colors are ok.can put a whole roll in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: James Troppe

customer_reviews.title: Dog bags
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Great price and convenience to have them shipped to home.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with Ostomy bags too.
customer_reviews.text: I got these little bags to use with my ostomy bags and they work great. It makes traveling so much easier too.
customer_reviews.author: Janice K

customer_reviews.title: Burst of fresh scent
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, with a quick burst of a fresh scent!
customer_reviews.author: Siouxfan

customer_reviews.title: A bit small for big messes
customer_reviews.text: These bags were a bit small for my large dog's big messes. The plastic seems very thing and is transparent, but I never actually had any problems with the bags breaking or leaking. They would probably be perfect for a small to medium dog. They are relatively easy to tear apart and are relatively easy to open (compared to other rolled dog waste bags). They actually seemed like a more colorful version of "Bags on Board." My big complaint is that I wanted something a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Double Duty

customer_reviews.title: Buy all the time
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bags. They are durable and open easily
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: These are a great value and putting them on auto ship/ subscribe and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value and putting them on auto ship/ subscribe and save has saved me from running out before I can get to the store to buy more. I know this is also ridiculous but I like the color variety.
customer_reviews.author: DQ

customer_reviews.title: These aren’t the best bags. They are kind of small so when ...
customer_reviews.text: These aren’t the best bags. They are kind of small so when my 50 pound dog takes a number two, you just wish the bag was a tad longer in the fear of touching the stuff when you tie it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poop bags
customer_reviews.text: Thought I wouldn’t like the scent but it’s not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: These bags are perfect. They are thick enough to hold the contents without breaking through and easy to get open. I had no trouble getting them to fit in my bag holder either, the little cardboard post in the middle of the bags doesn’t get hung up, the bags pull out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Bullion

product_meta.title: OUT! Dog Poop Bags | Strong, Leak Proof Dog Waste Bags | 9 x 12 Inches
product_meta.description: Color:Rainbow - Scented| Size:120 ctLife is difficult enough without worrying about how to pick up your dog’s poop. Work smarter, not harder with OUT! Rainbow Colored Dog Waste Pickup Bags. They’re strong and durable enough to do the job, and leak-proof enough to keep the mess inside. Guaranteed not to tear! Plus, they’re available in four fun colors (purple, yellow, green, and orange) and fit all OUT! Dog waste bag dispensers. Also great for cat litter pick-up! 100% dependable and 100% money-back guarantee with proof of purchase.
feature_bullets: LOOK FORWARD TO WASTE PICK-UP - OUT! Rainbow Colored Dog Waste Pickup Bags make the unseemly chore of picking up pet waste so quick, easy, and simple you’ll look forward to doing it. Okay, maybe not “look forward to,” but you won’t dread it as much.

DOESN’T HAVE TO BE A DIRTY JOB - Want to hear some good news? Four words: guaranteed not to tear. Our dog poop pickup bags are strong, durable, and leak-proof. They’re tough enough to hold any mess, and 100% dependable.
IT GETS EVEN BETTER - And there’s even more good news! These pickup bags fit and refill all OUT! Dog Waste Bag Dispensers. You don’t have to buy a new one!

AMPLE BAGS WAITING TO BE FILLED - Eight rolls with 15 pet waste bags per roll. And just to prove how much we want to simplify this part of your life, we’ll even do the math for you. That’s 120 individual doggie drop sacks!

BRIGHTEN UP YOUR CHORE - If you must serve as your dog’s toilet valet (and you must) there’s no reason to settle for dull, drab-colored poopie pouches. These pickup bags come in four festive colors: purple, yellow, orange, and green.
